Package eu.focusnet.app.ui.common

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DrawerListAdapter
    List adapter used by the drawer menu
    EmptyListItem
    A dummy list item to be used when the list is found to be empty.
    FeaturedListItem
    List item type being used for clickable entries in our listings.
    FeaturedListItemViewSet
    A View set holder for FeaturedListItems that allows recycling of list item in our list adapters.
    FocusDialogBuilder
    This class makes it easier to create a custom AlertDialog.
    NavigationListAdapter
    List Adapter used by the drawer menu and the listings of objects.
    SimpleListItem
    List item which contains an icon and a title.
    SimpleListItemViewSet
    A View set holder for SimpleListItems that allows recycling of list item in our list adapters.
    TouchTableView
    Specialized TableView overcoming problems when embedding TableView within ScrollView

    See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/13257990/android-webview-inside-scrollview-scrolls-only-scrollview
    TouchWebView
    Specialized WebView overcoming problems when embedding WebView within ScrollView

    See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/13257990/android-webview-inside-scrollview-scrolls-only-scrollview
    UiHelper
    This class contains static methods to help building commonly used UI elements.
